repository.name: redaxo
repository.description: REDAXO, a PHP-based CMS since 2004. Both simple and flexible.

issue.title: Improve PHPUnit assertions

repository.name: repman
repository.description: Repman - PHP Repository Manager: packagist proxy and host for private packages

issue.body:
# Changed log

- Using the `assertFileExists` to assert expected file path is existed.
- Using the `assertFileNotExists` to assert expected file path is not existed.
- Using the `assertIsResource` to assert expected type is `resource`.
- Using the `assertCount` to assert expected counter is same as result.

issue.title: [phpUnit] Suggest assert{Directory,File}DoesNotExist instead of deprecated assert{DirectoryFile}NotExists

repository.name: phpinspectionsea
repository.description: A Static Code Analyzer for PHP (a PhpStorm/Idea Plugin)

issue.title: Replace `assertFileNotExists()` method

repository.name: Slim-Psr7
repository.description: PSR-7 implementation for use with Slim 4

issue.body: This PR replaces `assertFileNotExists()` with `assertFileDoesNotExist()` since [it is deprecated](https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/4077) and will be removed in PHPUnit 10.

issue.title: Incorrect behavior of AssertTrueFalseToSpecificMethodRector

repository.name: rector
repository.description: Instant Upgrades and Automated Refactoring of any PHP 5.3+ code

issue.body:
# Bug Report

<!-- First, thank you for reporting a bug. That takes time and we appreciate that! -->

| Subject        | Details              |
| :------------- | :--------------------|
| Rector version | last dev-main      |
| Installed as   | composer dependency  |

## Minimal PHP Code Causing Issue

See https://getrector.org/demo/c283d1a6-15c4-4684-b2e8-274aa7755a95

```php
<?php

namespace Demo;

use PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase;

class DemoTest extends TestCase
{
    public function testDemo(): void
    {
        $this->assertFalse(file_exists('/tmp/demo.txt'));
    }
}
```

### Responsible rules

* `AssertTrueFalseToSpecificMethodRector`

## Expected Behavior

`assertFileDoesNotExist` instead of `assertFileNotExists` - https://github.com/sebastianbergmann/phpunit/issues/4077
